about_the_game:
Evil Hunt is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game. You and your team of paranormal investigators enter a haunted city full of paranormal activity and try to collect as much evidence as possible. Within the city there can be one or more ghosts in different houses. Use your ghost hunting equipment to find and record evidence that you can resell to a ghost removal team.

Immersive experience:

Realistic graphics and sounds as well as a minimalist user interface ensure a completely immersive experience. The fact that the ghosts can be in different houses and also change them makes the gaming experience even more intense and keeps you on your toes.

Equipment:

Use common ghost hunting devices such as EMF readers, ghost boxes, thermometers and night vision cameras to find clues and collect as much paranormal evidence as possible.

Full voice recognition:

All ghosts listen to you. You can communicate with each of them using the voicemail or hold sessions with the Ouija boards to interact with you. Once you step out of your HQ with your team, they can start investigating each house. Depending on the level of difficulty you choose, the experience becomes more intense.

Teamwork:

You and your team must be in contact at all times so that the spirits do not overwhelm and separate you. Never walk around alone. Ghosts generally react more aggressively when you spot an easy victim. Only together can you complete the mission.

Paranormal activity in the neighbourhood is increasing, so it's up to your team to use the right ghost hunting equipment at your disposal and identify the houses where paranormal activity can be found to collect as much evidence as possible.
